detailView.sql: SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN determination ON determination.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID INNER JOIN taxon ON determination.TaxonID = taxon.TaxonID INNER JOIN determinationstatus ON determination.DeterminationStatusID = determinationstatus.DeterminationStatusID WHERE determination.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determinationstatus.Type IN(1,2) AND %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.LocalityName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.EndDate, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s From collectingevent Inner Join locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, FullName, %s From collectionobject Inner Join determination ON determination.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by CatalogNumber asc

SELECT taxon.TaxonID, geography.FullName, locality.LocalityName, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, StartDate, taxon.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON geography.GeographyID = locality.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN determination ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = determination.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon ON determination.TaxonID = taxon.TaxonID INNER JOIN determinationstatus ON determination.DeterminationStatusID = determinationstatus.DeterminationStatusID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determinationstatus.Type IN(1,2) AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, StartDate, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, collector.OrderNumber, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionObjectID in (SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber) ORDER BY collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collector.OrderNumber
SELECT t1.TaxonID, t1.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.AcceptedID = t2.TaxonID WHERE %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, t.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN determination d ON d.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon t ON d.TaxonID = t.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t2.TaxonID = t.AcceptedID WHERE t.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, t.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN determination d ON d.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon t ON d.TaxonID = t.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t.TaxonID = t2.AcceptedID WHERE co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT DISTINCT co.CollectionObjectID, co.CatalogNumber, deterTax.FullName, acceptTax.FullName, oldTax.FullName, %s FROM collectionobject co INNER JOIN determination d ON d.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN taxon deterTax ON d.TaxonID = deterTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon acceptTax ON acceptTax.TaxonID = deterTax.AcceptedID INNER JOIN taxon oldTax ON oldTax.AcceptedID = acceptTax.TaxonID AND oldTax.TaxonID != deterTax.TaxonID WHERE co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber, CatalogedDate, FullName, %s From collectionobject Inner Join determination AS DT ON DT.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID Inner Join determinationstatus ON DT.DeterminationStatusID = determinationstatus.DeterminationStatusID AND determinationstatus.Type IN(1,2) Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE DT.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND %s order by CatalogNumber asc

SELECT agent.AgentID, agentvariant.Name, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, agent.AgentType, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID INNER JOIN agentvariant ON agent.AgentID = agentvariant.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by agentvariant.Name asc

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, localitynamealias.Name, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localitynamealias ON locality.LocalityID = localitynamealias.LocalityID WHERE locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.EndDate, %s From collectingevent Inner Join collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT accession.AccessionID, accession.AccessionNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionattachment ON accession.AccessionID = accessionattachment.AccessionID INNER JOIN attachment ON accessionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, attachment.Title, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agentattachment ON agent.AgentID = agentattachment.AgentID INNER JOIN attachment ON agentattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingeventattachment ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectingeventattachment.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectingeventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectionobjectattachment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectattachment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectionobjectattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID, conservdescription.ShortDesc, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservdescription INNER JOIN conservdescriptionattachment ON conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID = conservdescriptionattachment.ConservDescriptionID INNER JOIN attachment ON conservdescriptionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT conservevent.ConservEventID, conservevent.ExamDate, conservevent.TreatmentCompDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservevent INNER JOIN conserveventattachment ON conservevent.ConservEventID = conserveventattachment.ConservEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON conserveventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT dnasequence.DNASequenceID, dnasequence.GeneName, dnasequence.SeqDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM dnasequence INNER JOIN dnasequenceattachment ON dnasequence.DNASequenceID = dnasequenceattachment.DNASequenceID INNER JOIN attachment ON dnasequenceattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID, fieldnotebook.Name, fieldnotebook.StartDate, fieldnotebook.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebook INNER JOIN fieldnotebookattachment ON fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID = fieldnotebookattachment.FieldNotebookID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID, fieldnotebookpage.PageNumber, fieldnotebookpage.ScanDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpage INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpageattachment ON fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID = fieldnotebookpageattachment.FieldNotebookPageID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpageattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID, fieldnotebookpageset.OrderNumber, fieldnotebookpageset.StartDate, fieldnotebookpageset.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpageset INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpagesetattachment ON fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.FieldNotebookPageSetID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, attachment.Title, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localityattachment ON locality.LocalityID = localityattachment.LocalityID INNER JOIN attachment ON localityattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, permit.IssuedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN permitattachment ON permit.PermitID = permitattachment.PermitID INNER JOIN attachment ON permitattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT preparation.PreparationID, preparation.PreparedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM preparation INNER JOIN preparationattachment ON preparation.PreparationID = preparationattachment.PreparationID INNER JOIN attachment ON preparationattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, repositoryagreement.StartDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN repositoryagreementattachment ON repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID = repositoryagreementattachment.RepositoryAgreementID INNER JOIN attachment ON repositoryagreementattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, taxon.TaxonomicSerialNumber, attachment.Title, attachment.OrigFilename, %s FROM taxon INNER JOIN taxonattachment ON taxon.TaxonID = taxonattachment.TaxonID INNER JOIN attachment ON taxonattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.FirstName, agent.LastName, agent.EMail, address.Address, address.City, address.State, address.Postalcode, address.Country FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ON agent.AgentID = address.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, agent.LastName, permit.IssuedDate, permit.StartDate, permit.EndDate, permit.RenewalDate, permit.Type FROM permit LEFT JOIN agent ON permit.IssuedByID = agent.AgentID WHERE (%s)
SELECT AccessionID, AccessionNumber, Status, Type, DateAccessioned, DateReceived FROM accession WHERE (%s)

SELECT geography.GeographyID, geography.Name, geography.FullName, geographytreedefitem.Name FROM geography INNER JOIN geographytreedefitem ON geography.GeographyTreeDefItemID = geographytreedefitem.GeographyTreeDefItemID WHERE geography.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID AND (%s)
select PrepTypeID, Name from preptype where CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s)
SELECT DisciplineID, Name, Title FROM discipline WHERE (%s)
SELECT CatalogNumberingSchemeID, SchemeName, IsNumericOnly FROM catalognumberingscheme WHERE (%s)
SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName FROM taxon WHERE taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT AgentID, FirstName, LastName, MiddleInitial FROM agent WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s)
SELECT StorageID, FullName FROM location WHERE StorageTreeDefID = STORTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT LithoStratID, FullName FROM lithostrat WHERE LithoStratTreeDefID = LITHOTREEDEFID AND (%s)
SELECT PaleoContextID, TopDistance, DistanceUnits FROM paleocontext WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s)

SELECT DISTINCT loan.LoanID, LoanNumber, LoanDate, CurrentDueDate, OriginalDueDate FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loan.LoanID = loanpreparation.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation ON loanpreparation.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON preparation.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN collection ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collection.CollectionID INNER JOIN collectiontype ON collection.DisciplineID = collectiontype.DisciplineID INNER JOIN specifyuser ON collectiontype.SpecifyUserID = specifyuser.SpecifyUserID WHERE specifyuser.SpecifyUserID = SPECIFYUSERID AND loan.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (not (currentduedate is null)) AND (IsClosed = false or IsClosed is null) AND datediff(CURDATE(), currentduedate) > 0
SELECT LocalityID, LocalityName,Latitude1,Longitude1 FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT AttachmentID, OrigFilename FROM attachment WHERE (%s)
SELECT CollectionObjectID, CatalogNumber FROM collectionobject WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s)
SELECT CollectingEventID, StationFieldNumber, StartDate FROM collectingevent WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT GeologicTimePeriodID, FullName FROM geologictimeperiod WHERE GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND geologictimeperiod.IsBioStrat = 1 AND (%s)
SELECT JournalID, JournalName FROM journal WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT AppraisalID, AppraisalNumber FROM appraisal WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT ReferenceWorkID, Title FROM referencework WHERE (%s)
SELECT CollectingTripID, CollectingTripName, StartDate FROM collectingtrip WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT DivisionID, Name FROM division WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT ProjectID, ProjectName, ProjectNumber FROM project WHERE CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s)
SELECT RepositoryAgreementID, RepositoryAgreementNumber, StartDate FROM repositoryagreement WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
